remarks: The direct product is the binary subgroup product ("sum") of the direct products of the partition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjlid.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dpjghm $p |- ( ph -> ( P ` X ) e. ( ( G |`s ( G DProd S ) ) GrpHom G ) ) $.
